name: Brigida
description:
Cover image by TheRPGMakerAddict

rpgmaker.net Theme Roulette 4 Jam

(WORD-Exploration)(Genre-Drama)(Setting-Mythical)

In the floating nation of Mystria, Brigida's home town has been ransacked and destroyed by the evil Samurai Lord and his ninja minions and her daughter has been kidnapped for his evil plans. Brigida is a swashbuckler in a fantasy land with three levels of action platforming. 

This is a side-scrolling platformer made using the public Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 4EVER system created by Ashes of Emerald and presented on rpgmaker.net as a test demo. A magical seal blocks your path to the Samurai Lord's lair. Hunt down the spy in the Elftown. Find the Raven Sigil in the Mountain Trail.

Tiles and backgrounds by White Screw Store.

Original sprites and music by the developer.
